FuncDef:
The authentication ssl ssl-policy command configures the SSL policy for the OpenFlow connection between the SDN controller and switch.
The undo authentication ssl ssl-policy command restores the default setting. The authentication ssl ssl-policy command configures the SSL policy for the OpenFlow connection between the SDN controller and switch. The undo authentication ssl ssl-policy command restores the default setting. By default, no SSL policy is configured for an OpenFlow connection. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an SSL policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: The switch and SDN controller exchange information through the OpenFlow connection. To prevent access of unauthorized users and improve network security, configure an SSL policy for the OpenFlow connection.
